\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}

\begin{axis}[%
    width=8cm,height=8cm,
    x dir=reverse,
    % xlabel={RA (hours)},
    % ylabel={DEC (deg.)},
    % title=Taurus,
    ticks=none,
]
\addplot[%
    scatter=true,
    only marks,
    point meta=explicit symbolic,
    scatter/@pre marker code/.style={/tikz/mark size=\pgfplotspointmeta/5},
    scatter/@post marker code/.style={}
] table [meta index=2] {temp.dat};
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}%
